name: Aztec MD
description: multi bot with rich features made by Vorterx team

PREFIX.description: Prefix of your bot Ex: . , / , # , & etc. Put anything except @ (Default is .)

MONGODB.description: Add your mongourl, url to get connected to the bot

OWNER_NAME.description: Add your name (e.g. diegosonTech or suhailTechInfo)

MENU.description: Choose a number between 0 and 2, where 2 is Aztec menu, 0 is suhail menu. If you want it to change randomly, leave it blank

MODS.description: Put any phone number without +, () and spaces, e.g. 27686881509
